Name: breast rhabdomyosarcoma
Definition: A breast sarcoma that arises from skeletal muscle cells.

Name: breast angiosarcoma
Definition: An angiosarcoma and sarcoma of breast and vascular neoplasm of breast that is located_in the cells that line the blood vessels within the breast or underarm area.

Name: breast leiomyosarcoma
Definition: A breast sarcoma that arises from smooth muscle cells.

Name: breast hemangiopericytoma
Definition: A hemangiopericytoma that is manifested in the breast.

Name: breast liposarcoma
Definition: A breast sarcoma that arises from fat cells.

Name: breast fibrosarcoma
Definition: A breast sarcoma that arises from fibrous connective tissue and is characterized by the presence of immature proliferating fibroblasts or undifferentiated anaplastic spindle cells in a storiform pattern.

Name: breast osteosarcoma
Definition: A breast sarcoma that arises from bone.
